top_global_headline.title: IMF chief backs Fed independence amid Trump pressure

top_ai_item.title:
US
, European regulators set principles for 'good AI practice' in drug development

global_news.title:
IMF
 chief backs Fed independence amid Trump pressure
global_news.summary: International Monetary Fund chief Kristalina Georgieva reiterated support for Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell and central bank independence amid political scrutiny.
global_news.why_it_matters: Signals continued emphasis on data-driven policy in uncertain political environments.

ai_tech.title:
US
, European regulators set principles for 'good AI practice' in drug development
ai_tech.summary: The FDA and EMA issued joint guidance outlining principles for safe and responsible AI use across the drug lifecycle, aiming to balance innovation with patient safety.
ai_tech.why_it_matters: Regulatory alignment on AI in pharma could streamline development and compliance.
